common.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

errors.pageNotFoundDescription: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

auth.trackHealthJourney: All your lab results in one place
auth.dataSecure: Your health data is encrypted and secure
auth.serverOffline: Server is offline. Please try again later.
auth.emailVerifiedDesc: Your email has been verified successfully. You can now use all features.
auth.needNewLink: Need a new verification link? Login and request one from your profile.
auth.resetLinkSent: If an account exists with this email, we've sent a password reset link.
auth.checkSpam: Don't see it? Check your spam folder.
auth.forgotPasswordDesc: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link.
auth.passwordResetSuccessDesc: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now login with your new password.
auth.mustAcceptTerms: You must accept the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy
auth.verifyEmailBannerDesc: Check your inbox for a verification link
auth.vaultUnlockedSuccess: Your encrypted data is now accessible

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.noBiomarkersHint: Sync your medical accounts or upload a PDF to get started.

documents.title: Documents
documents.uploadHint: Upload your medical PDFs to get instant insights using our AI analysis.
documents.pdfOpenError: Could not open PDF. Please try again.
documents.deleteWarning: This will also delete all extracted biomarkers from this document and clear your health reports. You'll need to run a new AI analysis afterward.
documents.uploadSuccess: Document uploaded and analyzed successfully! AI extracted biomarkers from your PDF.
documents.deleteSuccess: Document deleted. Health reports have been cleared - run a new analysis when ready.
documents.rescanTooltip: Scan documents to extract patient names
documents.rescanNoUpdates: All documents already have patient names
documents.vaultLocked: Your vault is locked. Please log out and log back in.

biomarkers.title: Biomarkers
biomarkers.adjustFilters: Try adjusting your search or filters

healthReports.title: AI Health Analysis
healthReports.subtitle: AI-powered insights from your biomarkers
healthReports.noAnalysisHint: Run your first AI health analysis to get personalized insights from your biomarkers.
healthReports.disclaimer: This AI analysis is for informational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice. Always consult with a qualified healthcare provider for medical decisions.

gapAnalysis.title: Recommended Screenings
gapAnalysis.subtitle: AI-recommended tests based on your age and medical history
gapAnalysis.noAnalysisHint: Click "Get Recommendations" to see which health screenings you might be missing based on your age and medical history.

screenings.title: Recommended Screenings
screenings.subtitle: Personalized health screening recommendations based on your profile
screenings.noAnalysisHint: Get personalized health screening recommendations based on your age, gender, and medical history.
screenings.disclaimer: These recommendations are generated by AI based on general health guidelines and your profile. They are not a substitute for professional medical advice. Always consult with your healthcare provider about appropriate screenings for your individual needs.

linkedAccounts.title: Linked Accounts
linkedAccounts.subtitle: Connect your medical provider accounts for automatic sync

errors.wrongPasswordDesc: The username or password you entered is incorrect. Please update your credentials to restore the connection.
errors.captchaFailedDesc: The provider requires a CAPTCHA verification. Please try syncing manually from a browser.
errors.siteDownDesc: The provider's website is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.sessionExpiredDesc: Your login session has expired. Please try syncing again.
errors.timeoutDesc: The connection to the provider timed out. Please try again later.
errors.serverErrorDesc: Our sync service is temporarily unavailable. This is not a problem with your account - please try again in a few minutes.
errors.loginFailedDesc: We could not complete the login process. This is not necessarily a password issue - the provider's site may be having technical problems. Please try again later.
errors.syncErrorDesc: We connected successfully, but there was a problem downloading documents. Please try again.
errors.unknownDesc: A technical error occurred during sync. This is NOT a problem with your credentials. Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.

evolution.title: Evolution
evolution.selectBiomarker: Select a biomarker to see its evolution over time
evolution.noData: No data available for this biomarker
evolution.noHistory: No history found for this biomarker.
evolution.evolutionHistory: Evolution history of your results over time.

admin.title: Admin Dashboard
admin.noOpenaiData: No OpenAI usage data yet. Data will appear after API calls are made.

settings.title: Settings
settings.exportDataDesc: Download all your personal data as JSON
settings.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete your account and all data
settings.deleteAccountInfo: All your documents, biomarkers, health reports, and personal data will be permanently deleted.
settings.confirmDelete: I understand that this will permanently delete all my data

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.subtitle: This information helps AI provide better health insights
profile.infoNote: Your profile information is used by the AI to provide more personalized health insights. The more complete your profile, the better recommendations you'll receive.
profile.scanTooltip: Scan your medical documents to auto-fill profile data (name, date of birth, gender)
profile.scanNoNewData: No new profile data found (fields already filled or no data in documents)
profile.multiPatientDesc: Your documents contain data for different patients. Make sure your profile reflects your own information.

vault.title: Encryption Vault
vault.initializeDescription: Set up encryption to protect sensitive data
vault.unlockDescription: Enter master password to access the system
vault.notConfigured: Vault not initialized - visit /vault-unlock to set up
vault.passwordRequirement: Minimum 16 characters. This password cannot be recovered.
vault.lockConfirm: Are you sure you want to lock the vault? All encrypted data will become inaccessible until the vault is unlocked again.
vault.warningText: If you forget this password, all encrypted data will be permanently lost. There is no recovery mechanism.
vault.footer: Vault encryption protects sensitive medical data
vault.enterPasswordToUnlock: Enter your password to unlock your data
vault.sessionExpiredDesc: Your session has expired. Please enter your password to continue accessing your encrypted medical data.
vault.vaultLocked: Vault is locked. Contact administrator to unlock.
vault.personalVaultDescription: Your personal vault unlocks automatically when you log in. If you see "vault locked" errors, please log out and log back in.
vault.adminOnly: This page is for system administrators only
vault.systemVaultDescription: Legacy vault for admin operations and data migration
vault.perUserVaultInfo: User data is encrypted with individual per-user vaults (auto-unlocked on login)

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.preferencesDesc: Choose which notifications you want to receive by email
notifications.newDocumentsDesc: Receive email when new lab results are downloaded
notifications.abnormalBiomarkersDesc: Receive alert when a biomarker is outside normal range
notifications.analysisCompleteDesc: Receive email when AI health analysis is ready
notifications.syncFailedDesc: Receive notification when sync with a provider fails
notifications.remindersDesc: Receive periodic reminders for health checkups
notifications.frequencyDesc: How often you want to receive emails
notifications.quietHoursDesc: Don't send emails during this time period
notifications.pushSettingsDesc: Receive instant notifications in your browser
notifications.enablePushDesc: Get instant alerts when new results are available
notifications.pushBlocked: Notifications are blocked. Enable in browser settings.
notifications.pushDenied: Notification permission denied. Please enable in browser settings.
notifications.pushNotConfigured: Push notifications not available on this server.

subscription.limitDocuments: You've reached the document limit for the Free plan.
subscription.limitProviders: You've reached the provider limit for the Free plan.
subscription.limitAnalyses: You've used all AI analyses for this month.
subscription.limitFeature: {{feature}} is only available in the Premium plan.
subscription.limitGeneric: This feature requires a Premium subscription.

pricing.title: Choose the plan that's right for you
pricing.subtitle: Monitor your health with advanced AI analysis. Start free or get more with Premium.
pricing.premiumDesc: Everything you need for complete monitoring

cookies.title: We use cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze site usage. You can customize your preferences or accept all cookies.
cookies.essentialDesc: Required for the website to function. Cannot be disabled.
cookies.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how visitors use our website.

tickets.title: Support
tickets.subtitle: View your submitted feedback and support tickets
tickets.noTicketsHint: Feedback you submit will appear here
tickets.selectTicket: Select a ticket to view details

feedback.title: Send Feedback
feedback.submitted: Your feedback has been submitted successfully.
feedback.descriptionRequired: Please describe your issue or suggestion
feedback.submitFailed: Could not submit feedback. Please try again.

lifestyle.title: Lifestyle & Wellbeing
lifestyle.subtitle: Personalized nutrition and exercise advice based on your lab results

nutrition.supplements: Supplements to Discuss with Your Doctor

lifestyle.disclaimer: These lifestyle recommendations are generated by AI based on your lab results and profile. They are not a substitute for professional medical, nutritional, or fitness advice. Always consult with qualified healthcare professionals before making significant changes to your diet or exercise routine.
lifestyle.profileIncomplete: Complete your profile for more personalized recommendations
lifestyle.noAnalysisHint: Get personalized nutrition and exercise recommendations based on your biomarkers and health profile.
lifestyle.noBiomarkers: No biomarkers available for analysis. Please upload lab results first.
lifestyle.quotaExceeded: Monthly analysis limit reached. Upgrade your subscription for more analyses.

billing.title: Subscription & Billing
billing.subtitle: Manage your subscription and view usage
billing.paymentSuccess: Payment processed successfully! Your subscription has been activated.
billing.cancelledNotice: Subscription will cancel at the end of the current period
billing.familyDesc: Up to 5 members with all Premium benefits
billing.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel? You'll keep access until the end of your billing period.
billing.cancelSuccess: Subscription will be cancelled at the end of the current period
billing.paymentDisclaimer: Payment is securely processed by Netopia. We don't store your card details.
